phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
So these are Hage's famous tatoes.
I am not sure if they will be to your liking, Lord Salim, but help yourself.
They are so dry and flaky.
I have never had anything that made me so thirsty before.
It would seem that you are a splendid cook, Miss Lily.
I am not all that good, really...
Please, eat as much as you would like.
Why must a noble such as myself eat this unknown thing?
Oh, this makes me so thirsty.
Both Yuno and Asta sent us money from their first pay as Magic Knights.
We were able to buy so many tatoes that we can
feed the children as much as they want to eat every day.
Actually, could not you feed us something besides tatoes, too?
Look how big Yuno got from eating tatoes!
Yuno, it is wonderful that you are sending money home when you are just a newcomer.
You have helped us out a lot.
And not just with the tatoes.
We were able to plug up that hole in the floor.
We even dug up a well in the yard.
To think he would be able to do that...
I will send all of my pay.
Really, you do not have to.
We will be fine for a while with the amount you sent us.
Lord Salim, we should be on our way.
Oh, it will not hurt to stay a bit longer.
In the future, it will be important for nobles to have more knowledge of the world.
Miss Lily, may I have some more water?
I will go get some more.
I guess you are a gentleman.
My body just acted on its own.
It is just proper etiquette for a noble.
It is the same one the men who were after Lord Salim were wearing.
It must be because I put my robe on her.
Miss Lily was taken instead of me!
Is Sister going to be okay?
I need all of you to stay here.
I will be fine on my own.
Our mission is to escort Lord Salim.
We do not know when the enemy will come after him again.
You stay out of this, Mimosa.
Yuno, I am sure you are worried about the sister,
but let us leave her to the authorities who have jurisdiction here.
Disobeying an order is a crime.
Even so, I am going to go save her.
You are confusing recklessness with courage, Yuno.
I am not going to kill you or anything,
but I have got to at least rough you up a little bit.
So you were after me all along.
You are brighter than you look.
How is this magic supposed to drown me?
Looks like you completely fell for the footsteps I laid.
Take that, and that, and that, and that!
Why is size the only thing that matters to you people?
if the sister's pretty face got burned.
It looks like you have a talent for magic.
If you see someone in need, make sure you help them.
Why do not you hand over your grimoire?
You will not be able to do anything without it.
What do you plan to do with my grimoire?
Without your grimoire, you will be useless as a Magic Knight.
Then I will let you take your precious sister home.
I will not let you harm her.
Are you going to attack me?
I am not the one who is going to attack.
Steel Creation Magic: Fierce Spiral Lance!
I hope you defeated all of them.
What would you have done if I had not come?
Do you think I am some kind of fool?
Our duty as Magic Knights is to protect the people.
These men were after you, not Salim.
Do you think a noble would want to come to a village like this?
Do you think they would happily eat those tatoes?
Sorry to say it, but I definitely would not.
There is no way they would accidentally take Sister Lily instead of Salim, either.
It was strange for Salim, whom you defeated, to specifically ask you to escort him.
And that is when we used my Plant Creation Magic: Flower of Truth.
It is all your fault I was not able to join the Magic Knights, Yuno!
Who cares about your stupid four-leaf grimoire, damn it?!
I will steal it from you!
I will get my daddy to hurt you!
I am still surprised you managed to find me.
That was also thanks to Mimosa's abilities.
Flower Creation Magic: Magic Flower Guidepost.
That is why we were able to back you up.
You helped me out a lot, Klaus, Mimosa.
It is only natural that you lost to Yuno.
Our honorable captain of the Golden Dawn, William Vangeance, chose him!
That means he is truly that talented!
Do not get the wrong idea.
I still have not acknowledged you.
But I will overlook your insolence this time, since this was all Salim's doing.
Take him to the royal capital?
No, let us just leave them.
As long as they do not go near Hage Village again.
Do not ever try anything like this again.
Getting you to let your guard down was all part of my plan!
Water Creation Magic: Holy Strike of Love!
Show some remorse for what you have done!
I almost want to scout the sister for the Magic Knights.
Yuno, we are going to take them to the royal capital after all.
By the way, where did the other one go?
If they were actually in trouble, I was going save them, but I did not need to at all.
William's newbie is pretty impressive, too.
How long do you intend to fool around?
You need to return at once!
It is not healthy to be so irritated all the time.
Whose fault do you think that is, huh?!
Well, he is a Magic Knight.
Klaus, Mimosa, thank you both very much.
Salim was behind all of this.
Let me repay you with more tato dishes.
They have gotten a bit cold, but please eat as much as you would like!
You are not very honest, are you, Klaus?
The Wizard King was pleased with your work, and we received a star.
I never thought I would get one on my first mission.
But I do not feel as if we did enough to earn a star.
After you brought Salim in, he ended up confessing
to various evil deeds Lord Hapshass had done.
Bribes, fraudulent accounts, and shady deals.
It is all thanks to you three.
Sir, did you happen to take on this mission because you knew this would happen?
We must not allow any evil deeds to be done in the Clover Kingdom.
Klaus, Yuno, and Mimosa, I look forward to all of your future great deeds.
It appears that the newbies this year are... well, at least slightly competent.
I am counting on you all.
Everything ended well this time, but do not ever act on your own again, Yuno.
Look me in the eyes and say that you will not act on your own again.
The Golden Dawn received a star?!
And I thought we were finally only 100 away.
I thought we would finally caught up to them!
I am not going to lose!
I will catch up in no time!
Let us have them work on this mission.
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Does not it just scream Golden Dawn?
It is as cool as Magna's Crazy Cyclone and Bah-ha's Shooting Star!
I have no idea who you are, but thank you.
Exploring a dungeon will be easy!
Not giving up is my magic.
